articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description:
Remember Meebits? The Larva Labs money machine that raised a then scarcely believable $80m for a collection of voxel PFPs with no discernible utility, no roadmap, just the cachet of being from the same creators as the legendary punks. Meebits were the spur for Bored Ape owners to do everything in their power to raise …
  Yuga Adds Royalties to Meebits, What’s Next? Read More »
articles.title: Yuga Adds Royalties to Meebits, What’s Next?
